DataListSpec.Name: SponsorshipExtensionConversion Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Data List for sponsorship extension and conversion tables.
DataListSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_SPONSORSHIP_EXTENSION_CONVERSION( @SPONSORID uniqueidentifier ) as set nocount on; -- SponsorshipExtension table: select COMMITMENT.LOOKUPID + ' (' + convert(nvarchar, COMMITMENTSTART.TRANSACTIONDATE, 101) + ')' COMMITMENTNAME --se.INITIALOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID --,se.CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID ,se.CONVERSIONDATE ,se.DAYSTOCONVERT ,se.DATEADDED ,dbo.UFN_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY_TRANSLATIONFUNCTION(se.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID) as 'SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY' ,se.ISCURRENT ,dbo.UFN_USR_INITIALOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE_GETDESCRIPTION(se.INITIALOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID) as 'INITIALSTATUS' ,dbo.UFN_USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE_GETDESCRIPTION(se.CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID) as 'CURRENTSTATUS' from dbo.SPONSORSHIP s join dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION se on se.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENT as COMMITMENT on COMMITMENT.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on s.CONSTITUENTID = c.ID where c.ID = @SPONSORID
